summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account balance and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's business checking account for the month of November 2016. It outlines the beginning and ending balances, as well as any fees or charges incurred during the period.

keyFacts: The document details a business checking account for Jeffrey Epstein with a balance of $598,125.36 as of November 30, 2016.
There were no deposits or other credits during the statement period.
The account incurred no service charges or fees during the month.
The document includes contact information for Deutsche Bank in case of inquiries regarding the account.
The statement is marked as confidential and subject to legal protections.
